meanings.definition: A person who is traveling in a vehicle, such as a car, bus, or train.
meanings.sent1: The passengers on the bus chatted happily during the journey.
meanings.sent2: The train conductor announced the arrival of the passengers at the station.
meanings.sent3: The passengers on the carpool made jokes to pass the time.
meanings.sent4: The passengers in the taxi shared stories of their day.
meanings.sent5: The passengers in the crowded subway held onto the handrails tightly.

meanings.definition: A person who is traveling on a ship or airplane.
meanings.sent1: The passengers on the cruise ship enjoyed the ocean view.
meanings.sent2: The flight attendant welcomed the passengers aboard the plane.
meanings.sent3: The passengers on the yacht waved at passing boats playfully.
meanings.sent4: The passengers on the airplane felt the turbulence during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The passengers on the hot air balloon marveled at the landscape below.
